0: Very easily without any trouble or difficulty.

1: 쉬어 가며 천천히 길을 가거나 일을 하는 모양.

0: In the manner of walking or working without making haste, taking frequent rests.
In the manner of the rain, wind, etc., stopping for a moment and then falling or blowing again repeatedly.

2: With a lot of possibility of happening.
Shortly or in a little while.

1: 공기나 입김 따위가 좁은 구멍으로 새어 나오는 소리.

0: A word mimicking the sound made when air moves quickly through a narrow gap.
With a high possibility that something will happen.
Shortly or after a short time.

1: 공기나 입김 따위가 좁은 구멍으로 자꾸 새어 나오는 소리.
여럿이 다 빠르게 지나가는 소리. 또는 그 모양.

0: A word mimicking the sound made when air moves quickly through a narrow gap.
A word mimicking the sound made when several objects or persons move quickly, or such a manner.
